title: As Earth Turned Into a Fantasy World, I Was the Only One Left Out - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Martial Arts   Mystery   Shounen   Supernatural
tags: Aggressive Characters   Anti-social Protagonist   Calm Protagonist   Curious Protagonist   Death   Depictions of Cruelty   Fantasy Creatures   Hard-Working Protagonist   Harsh Training   Male Protagonist   Overpowered Protagonist   Weak to Strong
author: ふるえもん
description:
Ritsu Yozakura was an average 2nd year high-schooler, but after encountering a mysterious light in the mountains, he became capable of using the power of “Kikou”.

Right as he learns to wield this power, monsters start appearing on earth…>
